00157 BOOLEAN LoadBRName(UINT16 ubIndex, STR16 pNameString )
00158 {
00159 
00160       for (int i=0;i<80;i++)
00161       {
00162             if ( i<(int)strlen(Item[ubIndex].szBRName))
00163                   pNameString[i] =  Item[ubIndex].szBRName [i];
00164             else
00165                   pNameString[i] ='\0';
00166       }
00167 
00168       return TRUE;
00169 }

00261 
00262 void LoadAllItemNames( void )
00263 {
00264       UINT16 usLoop;
00265 
00266       for (usLoop = 0; usLoop < MAXITEMS; usLoop++)
00267       {
00268             LoadItemInfo( usLoop, ItemNames[usLoop], NULL );
00269 
00270             // Load short item info
00271             LoadShortNameItemInfo( usLoop, ShortItemNames[usLoop] );
00272 
00273       }
00274 }
00275 
00276 void LoadAllExternalText( void )
00277 {
00278       LoadAllItemNames();
00279 }
00280 
00281 INT16* GetWeightUnitString( void )
00282 {
00283       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ] ) // metric
00284       {
00285             return(INT16 *)( pMessageStrings[ MSG_KILOGRAM_ABBREVIATION ] );
00286       }
00287       else
00288       {
00289             return(INT16 *)( pMessageStrings[ MSG_POUND_ABBREVIATION ] );
00290       }
00291 }
00292 
00293 FLOAT GetWeightBasedOnMetricOption( UINT32 uiObjectWeight )
00294 {
00295       FLOAT fWeight = 0.0f;
00296 
00297       //if the user is smart and wants things displayed in 'metric'
00298       if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_USE_METRIC_SYSTEM ] ) // metric
00299       {
00300             fWeight = (FLOAT)uiObjectWeight;
00301       }
00302 
00303       //else the user is a caveman and display it in pounds
00304       else
00305       {
00306             fWeight = uiObjectWeight * 2.2f;
00307       }
00308 
00309       return( fWeight );
00310 }
